titles.title: Gekijou Butai Aisatsu Shuu: Koukai Shonichi Butai Aisatsu / Koukai Futsuka Me Butai Aisatsu / 100-mannin Toppa Arigatou! Dai Hit Orei Butai Aisatsu / Iwai! Nihon Academy Shou Saiyuushuu Animation Sakuhin Shou Shushou Dai Hit Orei Butai Aisatsu
